root.title: boe ba say order worth one billion dlr
root.body: boe co say order 15 extended-rang 767-300 amr corp amr worth one billion dlr compani say amr first custom 767-300er twinjet deriv 767-200 design increas passeng cargo capabl flight 6,600 mile say first deliveri schedul februari 1988 jet seat 215 tri-class configur boe say order 47 767-300 new york airbu industri say amr also launch custom a300-600r widebodi amr today announc order 15 boe 25 airbu twinjet airbu say amr configur a300-600r seat 16 first class 251 economi deliveri make bewtween april 1988 june 1989 airbu disclos valu order boe say amr oper 767 north atlant rout airbu say amr oper a300 caribbean rout
